item.description: Hello there! ğŸ‘‹ I’m Gautham Mohanraj, and I hail from the charming town of Mahe. Now, Mahe might raise a few eyebrowsâ€”it’s nestled within Puducherry, which primarily speaks Tamil, yet here I am in Kerala’s embrace. ğŸŒ´ğŸŒŠ I learned to code in ninth grade.Back then, coding was just a cool trick to impress my pals. Little did I know, that initial spark would kindle an enduring passion. ğŸ–¥ï¸ğŸ’¡ Though my early projects might not have turned heads, each line of code I wrote carried a piece of my enthusiasm.
